div.span: Tecumseh Local Schools are closed through Friday, May 1, 2020. Updates will be provided as information becomes available.

div.h2: Learning For All ~ Whatever It Takes!

img.alt: Half staff flag for SSG Wesley Williams

br.span: The Board meeting will be streamed live via our district facebook page. Please join us at 6:30pm.

div.span: During this time of difficulty and uncertainty, it is our hope to stay as digitally connected to our students as possible. We have created a space
